dialogue.introduction: Destroyer class, Asashio. I'm always ready for a battle.
dialogue.library_intro: Nameship for the Asashio-class destroyers, Asashio. Made as a balanced ship, to work on the front lines. My improved form became the Kagerou-class, you know.
dialogue.secretary1: Yes, I'm always available for a sortie.
dialogue.secretary3: Commander, is that a new code?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, if you tell me to stay here, I am willing to wait here forever!!
dialogue.secretarymarried: U-umm... this may sounds intrusive coming from me but... I've always respected the Commander!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, what is it, calling me out to such a place. Just the two of us… ah, this is… a strategy meeting, yes?
dialogue.equipment2: For a destroyer, this is a good make.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: It can be fatal even though it's just a small damage
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm fine, I'll join on the next battle.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been built.
dialogue.night_battle: I'll close in on the enemy. One shot, one kill!
dialogue.mvp: I'm glad that we completed the operations. This is the power of Asashio Type Destroyer.
dialogue.sunk: To attack me when I'm on a rescue operation... How cheap.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas...? Admiral, so this is Christmas! Asashio learned it a lot!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: End of year cleaning, Admiral? I understand! Me and Arashio will start cleaning together. Listen well, Arashio, we'll start with the Admiral's desk.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Year! This year, please do take of us as well! As a representetive of the Asashio type, I came here to tell you that!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Commander, it's Setsubun! Leave it to me! This Asashio will throw at full power! Ei! Ei! Soorye!
